properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 4 at 12:58PM PST until January 6 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Large breaking waves of 5 to 7 feet. Dangerous rip
currents are likely.

* WHERE...Ventura County Coast.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 6 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...There is an increased risk for ocean drowning. Rip
currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Large
breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and
rocks, and capsize small boats near shore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest surf is expected to occur along
west facing shores.
properties.instruction:
Remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions, or stay
near occupied lifeguard towers. Rock jetties can be deadly in
such conditions, stay off the rocks.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 6 AM PST MONDAY
